title: Wood Burning Fireplace, Convenient Access to 405, Private Balcony
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Seize your chance to live in one of the premier apartment communities in Kirkland, WA.
Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Located in Totem Lake, Kirkland, with easy access to I-405 and NE 124th Street, Heronfield Apartments is just minutes away from Google, as well as all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby cities like Bellevue and Redmond have to offer.

Heronfield Apartments provides its residents a wide selection of unique one, two, or three bedroom apartment homes that feature exclusive community and household amenities like a heated indoor and outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center, and hot tub.

Come wiggle your toes in our picturesque pool, stroll through our pet-friendly community with your favorite furry companion, or have a day out on the town in nearby Redmond or at Kirkland's downtown waterfront and shops.
We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you dont just lease, you live.
Go take a look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by and visit us for your personal tour today!
Pets - Max 2 allowedComments: Pet Fee $250.00 per pet, Pet Rent $35.00 per pet and Pet Deposit $250.00 per pet.

Argentino Tosa (Tosa Inu) American Staffordshire Terrier Canary Dog (Presa Canario) Fila
